msbt.message: Hey, maybe you can help me I seem to have misplaced one of my most expensive bags.
I'll look for it. Want me to look?
Aw, that's too bad. Sorry to hear that.
Oh! You know what? I just realized that I don't have my favorite bag with me!
I'll look for it. Want me to look?
Aw, that's too bad. Sorry to hear that.
Don't tell anyone else about this, but I lost a REALLY expensive bag recently. I don't even want to say how much it cost I'll start crying again.
Maybe I can find it! Want me to look?
Ouch. Sorry. Darn! Sorry to hear it.

Something really weird happened to me recently. One of my favorite bags grew legs and walked away! Alright, it didn't really grow legs, but that would be cool, right? Like, some kind of designer pet bag
I could look for it! Maybe I can find it...
Sorry to hear that. Good luck with that.
You know what's frustrating? I was right in the middle of a good book when I lost it somewhere. Argh!
Maybe I can find it! Want me to look?
Oh no! Sorry! Sorry to hear that.
So, I was reading this book that I just couldn't put down. Then I put it down ONE time and now it's lost!
Maybe I can find it! Want me to look?
Oh, that's too bad! Sorry to hear that.
I almost don't even want to say anything, but I lost a really important notebook recently. It's filled with business ideas, song lyrics, fashion sketches It's completely priceless!
Maybe I can find it! Want me to look?
Oh no! I'm so sorry!
I've been trying to keep this under wraps, but I recently lost a very important notebook. Every time I think about someone finding it and reading what's inside, I have a little panic attack
Maybe I can find it! Want me to look?
Oh no! I'm so sorry!
You'd do that for me? Well, I won't say no! Bring it straight to me if you find it, OK?
Really? Well, alright! If you find anything that even remotely looks like a bag, bring it to me ASAP!
, you're the best! I wasn't even going to ask you directlyyet. So, if you find a bag—ANY BAG— please bring it to me immediately!
Yes! I was secretly hoping someone would offer to help me!Alright, just bring me any bag you find, legs or not. Thanks!
Yeah, I should probably just learn to be more careful with my things. Butthat's not gonna happen.
Yeah, I know. Now I'll have to pick a new favorite bag from among the fifty other bags I have in my closet!
Yeah. Thank you. Now I just have to think about how to replace it.Do you think I'd get much blowback if I tried to crowdfund a new one?
Yeah, thank you. I mean, I know it's not the end of the world.If you want to know if a bag is truly yours, set it free and see if it comes back to you.
Really? That would be excellent! Try not to lose my bookmark if you do find it.
Yes! That would be such a huge help. I was in the middle of such a good part when I lost it!
You'd do that for me? Well, I almost feel bad—I didn't mean to seem like I was asking for help But I will gladly take it! If you find it, please bring it back to me without looking inside!
Would you? Really?<10_4 /> OK, but I have to remind you about the highly confidential nature of this notebook. If you find it, immediately blindfold yourself and rush it back to me posthaste!
Maybe I should switch to books on tapeand strap the headphones to my head until I'm done.
Yeah. Mark my words, I'm never putting down a good book while I'm in the middle of it again!
That's alright. I'd almost rather lose the notebook forever than have anyone else get their hands on it.
It's OK. At this point I'm actually hoping it's been destroyed. Better that than the alternative
Whoa, perfect timing! I've got a small favor to ask youHave you seen my bag anywhere? I had it this morning, and now I can't find it anywhere!
I could look for it!
Haven't seen it, sorry.

Oh, ! Just the person I was hoping to see. You see, I'm on a bit of a quest It's an epic adventure spanning the globe in search of wealth, wisdom, and true love Oh, but today I'm just looking for my lost bag. Have you seen it?
I can help you look!
Uh...no. Sorry.
Yeah! I knew you'd come through for me, !Just bring it on back to me as soon as you can when you find it, OK?
Ah, that's OK. Guess I'll just keep meandering aimlessly until I come across it!
You're my hero! Now I can focus on my grandiose delusions instead of something productive. Alright, just bring it right back to me if you find it, OK?
Ah, that's alright. It wouldn't be an epic quest without a few setbacks along the way, right?

Hey, do you have a minute? I don't want to say this too loudly, but I lost a really important notebook I never leave home without it, so it should be outside somewhere, but I feel like I've looked everywhere! So, have you seen what appears to be a life-changingly important notebook sitting around anywhere?!
I'll help find it.
Sorry, haven't seen it.
Oh, hey, Sorry, I'm kinda distracted. I'm looking for a notebook that I lost. I know it's outside somewhere because I've already turned my house inside out!
I could help look!
Good luck with that.
Muchas gracias! You're way too nice to me.If you happen to find it, you know where to find me!
Well, thanks anyway. Oh, if only I could flip through its pages one last time
Excellent! I owe you big-time, ! Or I will when you find it Just bring it right back to me, OK? We don't need to get any middlemen involved in this thing.
Uh, thanks, I guess I better get back to looking around literally everywhere on this island
